Articles.Content:
I can't stop playing TF2 and I wanna return to KSP, I just can't find the motivation. I don't like the stock KSP system (I find it too boring as I've been in it so much) and I don't like all of the system overhauls, because mostly they have no DV map D: RSS I have problems with too, I can never get into orbit!

 

But anyway, welcome meh back!
You left? I swear I saw you post the other day.
